body:
If you kill somebody with kit stomper it says they killed themselves.

http://i.imgur.com/ywUPq5l.jpg

The above is an example, WitherVortexMC was weak when I jumped on him, killing him, but it says "WitherVortexMC was slain by WitherVortexMC's iron sword".  Of course, the issue is experience points - when I jump on somebody and kill them I want the XP.

Also, fire still does not spread.  Please fix this, burning used to be a great way to attack skybases.

title: Stomper kills are not counting for XP (pic)

replies.body: Also... kit stomper can now hurt / kill teammates.  I thought that teammates were supposed to be immune from stomp damage?  (I added this to my post on the github site).
